availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David W Phillips (Marion County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of David Phillips and Elizabeth Phillips. Married to Laura Doom Phillips in Nelson County, Kentucky on June 5, 1847. Father of William Phillips. Merchant in Marion County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 343A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon, p. 552.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film #001929414, p. 201.
